Boarding

Enrichment-Based Dog Care

What Does Enrichment Based Mean? It means that whether your dog is here for boarding or daycare they will have access to: Small group off leash play, your puppy will be happy-tired NOT exhausted Physical agility exercises, Mental enrichment activities, and rest times.

Enrichment-Based Boarding

$22/Additional Pet

  • Small group off leash play
  • Physical agility exercises
  • Mental enrichment activities
  • Rest times
  • A night's stay with quality care

From Fetch to Naptime: A Glimpse into Your Dog's Daily routine

Discover a day of joy at our Doggy Daycare! Here is a typical day where we ensure your pup enjoys play, treats, and rest in a safe, happy space. Join us in creating awesome memories for your pet!

7:00am - 8:00am Arrivals

Your dog will be checked in and any belongings will be placed in their bin.

8:00am - 10:30am Morning Activities

It's time for your dog's first enrichment session! Your dog will be participating in a small and controlled play groups!

10:30am - 12:00pm Mental Enrichment Activities

Your dog will be participating in mentaling stimulating activities! This could involve a bit of fun training or puzzle toys!

12:00pm - 2:00pm Nap Time & Mid-day Pick Ups

It's nap time! Did you know the average puppy needs anywhere between 18 to 20 hours of sleep a day? The average adult dog needs anywhere from 12 to 18 hours a day of sleep. Our scheduled nap time allows your dog to recharge and maintain a healthy mind!

2:00pm - 4:30pm Afternoon Activities

During afternoon activities we like to slow the brain down! This is where your dog will do some basic agility to really focus on their body's movement!

4:30pm-6:30pm Pick Up

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Vitae, facilis.

8:00pm - 10:00pm Decompression Walk

Overnight stays will get a decompression walk; a relaxed, exploratory stroll designed to help your pet unwind and acclimate to their surroundings!
